name: PRUX-Coin
description: PRUX-Coin is a very fast, mineable, scrypt algorithm, rare Altcoin. Fast Block all 9 sec fast tx are possible. For a normal broadcast less than a minute. In addition, PRUX has only very few coins per new mined block, so it is very rare. On 20.01.2041 we have calculated total of 114`375 PRUX mined.
